title: Infosys
author: ''
date: '2022-11-16'
slug: infosys
categories: []
tags: []
images:
  - /img/cover.png
r_init: |-
  
description: The Government of Canada spent an estimated $23.9M
  in 2021-2022 on contracts with Infosys. The average
  contract duration was 5.75 years, and the average contract value
  (not including contracts under $10k) was $137.5M. The longest
  contract was 5.75 years. The largest contract by value (including
  amendments) was $137.5M.
lookup_name: 'INFOSYS'
most_recent_fiscal_year_total: '23.9M'
most_recent_fiscal_year_year: '2021-2022'
s431_number_of_contracts: '1'
s431_number_of_contracts_with_amendments: '1'
s431_number_of_contracts_amendments_percentage: '100%'
s432_mean_amendment_increase_percentage: '71%'
s434_mean_number_of_amendments: '5'
s433_total_amendment_increase_value: '57.2M'
s424_mean_duration: '5.75'
s421_mean_contract_value: '137.5M'
s425_max_duration: '5.75'
s422_max_contract_value: '137.5M'
---
